situation: M was confused when lunch was served later than usual due to a fire drill. He began to wander around the classroom, looking for snacks in other students' backpacks.
action: The teaching assistant sternly told M to sit down and deducted points from his classroom behavior chart as a consequence.
effect: M felt singled out and became more withdrawn during class. He was left feeling anxious and uncertain about future changes in schedule.
topic: Routine Disruptions - Changes in daily schedule or expected activities
